@virito - I like netorare/cheating with revenge/justice but you only only get that on the last three or so pages of a doujin almost 400 pages long. Yeah the alpha ends up ruined, many years later, and the beta ends up successful, many years later, while the girl is forgotten. But it's not enough of a payoff for something that drags on for so long.

To clarify my comment the playboy had a lot of anti fans as well, and the girl does no seem to be married to the mc as he only reminiscence memories of his past girlfriend on how it was talking with her. He stated he will only his wife from then on and they have similar interest. Which implies that it is a new girl and the other girl is out there fixing her life or making it worse.

In the end guys, the mc dated the fmc for aw while, but she continued cheating on him and the playboy showed him everything. After a time skip the playboy became a famous actor but his scandals and past were exposed and I think he went to jail or something. Either way his life is ruined and he was shown in a news all broken and looks dirty as hell. The MC overcame everything and became a famous director, he got married and the cheating girl was only a part of his memory and her whereabout were never mentioned.
